name: Behind Society
description:
What is it?

It's simple strategy turn-based 2d game created by one person - me.

Story

You are 17 and you're living with your mother. In school you are total looser, you have tried many times to make some friends, but all your attempts were unsuccessful. You have something which repulses everyone you meet - you are a nerd. One day in school, you said to yourself "That's enough!". You decided to act. You had enough of everyone ignoring you and your genius. You have extraordinary IT skills, so you put them to good use. You hacked the main school computer and made a big mess with everyones data, grades and names. When you did this you felt like you had unlimited power. You felt you can do anything you ever wanted. Your goal is to launch the biggest hacker attack in history, but in order to make it happen your plan needs resources...
